00063 #ifndef SWIG
00064 #define IdCntSameType(i1,i2) \
00065    ((i1) &&(i2)  && (IdCntType(i1)==IdCntType(i2)) )
00066 #define IdCntFree(pi)   \
00067    _IdCntFree((PCONTOUR*)&(pi))
00068 #define IdCntAddPoint(contour_,valx,valy)   \
00069    _IdCntAddPoint(&(contour_),(valx),(valy))
00070 #define IdCntInsertPoint(contour_,numPoint,valx,valy) \
00071    _IdCntInsertPoint(&(contour_),(numPoint),(valx),(valy))
00072 #else
